intent_atoms.description: Implement comprehensive multi-layer validation system for GitHub Actions workflows to prevent broken workflows in main branch.
Fix YAML syntax errors in performance-regression.yml by correcting heredoc indentation.
YAML files must use 2 spaces per indentation level, no tabs, and heredoc content must match parent block indentation.
Use pre-commit hooks (check-yaml, check-added-large-files, trailing-whitespace, end-of-file-fixer, validate-github-workflows) for local validation.
Implement CI validation workflow with jobs: validate-yaml-syntax (PyYAML), validate-with-actionlint (actionlint), report-validation (summary).
